attributes.action: To make politics compulsory in secondary education, to prevent social ignorance
attributes.additional_details: Making politics compulsory in secondary education would prevent social ignorance, which is the main problem in the United Kingdom today, as too many youths are ignorant to others and the society. With this compulsory, youths would have a higher understanding of the place they live today, and give them reasons and culture in prevention from ignorance and crime, mending our broken society.
